mapper.sql: id, inspection_id, rectify_name, rectify_person, rectify_date, create_time, update_time, rectify_content
mapper.update:
UPDATE store_inspection_rectify
inspection_id = #{inspectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rectify_name = #{rectifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rectify_person = #{rectifyPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rectify_date = #{rectifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rectify_content = #{rectifyContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
